mapper.insert: insert into chat_member (chatroom_id, seller_id, buyer_id, buyer_img) values (#{chatroomId}, #{sellerId}, #{buyerId}, #{buyerImg})
mapper.select: select no, chatroom_id, ( select seller_id member_id from chat_member where chatroom_id = cl.chatroom_id and seller_id != #{buyerId} union select buyer_id from chat_member where chatroom_id = cl.chatroom_id and buyer_id != #{buyerId} ) member_id, msg, time, (select count(*) from chat_log where chatroom_id = cl.chatroom_id and time > (select last_check from chat_member where chatroom_id = cl.chatroom_id and seller_id = #{buyerId})) unread_count from ( select cl.*, row_number() over(partition by chatroom_id order by time desc) rnum from chat_log cl where chatroom_id in (select chatroom_id from chat_member where buyer_id = #{buyerId} or seller_id = #{buyerId}) ) cl where rnum = 1 and member_id is not null
